metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23909 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer over-read in function png_convert_4 in file pngex.cc in AdvanceMAME through 2.1.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> While the CVE description mentions AdvanceMAME, advancecomp is the actual code and is provided by the AdvanceMAME project.  Could not reproduce crash with focal, jammy, or lunar. Marking as deferred until a patch is available.

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
cloop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
